plugins.name: skill-gen
plugins.description: Auto-generate agent skills from documentation using Firecrawl. Ask Claude to research any docs or pass a URL directly - it extracts patterns, generates SKILL.md with proper frontmatter, and creates reference files. Use when you need a skill for an API, framework, or tool but don't want to write it manually.
plugins.author: Railly Hugo
